name: Nature Maker
description:
This is a game made for the "The Flair Fair" Game Jam.

This is a sandbox game where you create a world and fill it with life. Each life form generates energy for you to fuel your creations. The large the biodiversity in your world the more powerfull you get, allowing to expand the size of the world and unlock new options.

Controls:

  1. Mouse
  2. Left button: selection, place terrain blocks, plants, animals
  3. Right button: delete objects
  4. Middle button: pan view
